notes.player:
When reroll with FP: gain an extra +10 on the reroll. May share this ebenfit with an ally within sight&communication range as reaction

You gain a +1SL Bonus whenever you re-roll a Test with a Fate Point after failing your initial attempt. You may spend a Reaction to pass this benefit to any ally spending Fate Points to re-roll a Test as long as the ally is within line of sight and communications range.

requirement.value: Faithful (Imperial Cult) Talent, 1 Advance in Presence(Leadership)
requirement.script: return (this.actor.itemTypes["specialisation"].find(i => i.name == "Leadership" && i.system.skill == "presence")?.system?.advances >= 1) && this.actor.itemTypes["talent"].find(i => i.name == "Faithful(Imperial Cult)")
